channel.title: How do I use moparscape with different source code?
channel.description: When I downloaded Moparscape it came standard with Hybridscape source code. I was wondering how I use different source code for the client? I have a whole folder with it's own source. I tried just replacing all the files in the Hybridscape folder with the new stuff but then the client won't work properly. I just get stuck at the title screen where it says 'Start Server' and 'Enter', and I can't do anything. Is there an easy fix? Thanks in advance.

item.title: How do I use moparscape with different source code?
item.dc:creator: @_James_scape _James_scape
item.description:
@_James_scape wrote:

google hybridscape source and then download it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I use moparscape with different source code?

item.title: How do I use moparscape with different source code?
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

Check out the Download Section.

Download those files, and click something along the lines of ‘run.bat’ or ‘runserver.bat’.
Then, open the moparscape client, enter your username/password and connect using the ip ‘localhost’.
(Default port is 43594, I think.)

If you really get into it, you could look into port forwarding and start your own server that others could play too.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I use moparscape with different source code?

item.title: How do I use moparscape with different source code?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Don’t do that… Get another source (possibly the download section?) and in that source double click run.bat, or something like it, then on the client, login using the IP ‘localhost’

Read full topic

item.description:
@karl1 wrote:

just press run or runserver in the files then use moparscape client normaly connect on localhost

@Noobster1337 wrote:

When I downloaded Moparscape it came standard with Hybridscape source code. I was wondering how I use different source code for the client? I have a whole folder with it’s own source. I tried just replacing all the files in the Hybridscape folder with the new stuff but then the client won’t work properly. I just get stuck at the title screen where it says ‘Start Server’ and ‘Enter’, and I can’t do anything. Is there an easy fix? Thanks in advance.
